name: ISMAK
description:
I Swallowed My Arrow Key

"ISMAK" is a timed hack and slash game where you are assigned randomly generated quests in order to keep your timer going. You can also play with up to 4 friends.

ISMAK was made for Ludum Dare 26's jam where the theme was "Minimalism".

Included in the download:

  • The full game.
  • The full soundtrack.
  • The entire source code (written in Java).
